title: Fluorescence lifetime imaging unravels the pathway of glioma cell death upon hypericin-induced photodynamic therapy
content:

Miriam C. Bassler, Jonas Hiller, Frank Wackenhut, Sven zur Oven-Krockhaus, Philipp Frech, Felix Schmidt, Christoph Kertzscher, Tim Rammler, Rainer Ritz, Kai Braun, Marcus Scheele, Alfred J. Meixner, Marc Brecht
This study uses fluorescence lifetime imaging and spatially-resolved spectroscopy to explore morphological changes in single glioma cells during hypericin-induced photodynamic therapy, offering insights into the underlying cell death mechanisms.
